executable.title: Merge Tube Graphs (TubeTK)
executable.description: Map multiple graphs into just one graph.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

string.name: listFile
string.label: Object Document
string.description: Object document file containing subject-specifc graphs.

integer.name: nCentroids
integer.label: Number of Centroids
integer.description: Number of centroids (of CVT) used to compute the subject-specific graphs.
